content:
Does anybody have a URL to the Morgan Gleeson letter? The letter is publicly available to use as an example, right? I'm thinking mapping it to Composition might be a nice little exercise to do between now and the working group meeting.
https://www.hl7.org/fhir/composition.html
@Debi Willis Do you know where the original letter is? I know we started with that
Found it: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1QDBIHmzJS7SFFUhh2T-Is6iB9QYqDFi_z1OTX9h4OtU/edit Dave might have created it.

Virginia Lorenzi said:

Dave might have created it.

Au contraire - it offers me "Request edit access." Must have been @Debi Willis !

While we're at it, her 2018 blog post about this 2016 error is here
It was initially an image copied into Zulip after her DevDays talk. I grabbed that and copied it to the google drive.
